item.description:
The July 4 weekend Montreal Jazz Festival trip is coming up soon, so let get together to make some plans! This will be a chance to meet each other, see who is going on the trip and maybe find someone to carpool with.

If you haven't seen the event listing, look for it on the calendar page. By the time for the trip comes there will be a daily schedule of events for the entire weekend. This will be the second trip to Montreal for the Boston Walking Meetup Group.
item.name: Montreal trip planning dinner
